desc.p: This field contains the reason for modifying the record.
The ID is of the format BENCHMARK ID.YYYYMM
The Benchmark Id is checked for a valid record in AM.BENCHMARK
Month and Year should not be less than the date given in AM.PERF.PARAMETER.
If the month and the date is less than the Globus Go Live date given in AM.PERF.PARAMETER, it means that the application is being used as a Take-on History.

If the month and date is greater than the Globus Go Live date given in AM.PERF.PARAMETER, search for the record in AM.BENCHMARK.PERF and display it. If a record does not exists the user should not be able to create a new record.
This field contains the date on which the Benchmark performance is calculated.
The Month and Year must be the same as given in the ID.
The dates given in the multivalue sets must not be equal.
The date given in one multivalue set must be less than the date given in the next multivalue set and greater than the date given in the previous multivalue set.
If the given date is a Holiday an Override message is given.
This field contains the Performance Index (Net) of the particular day.
The field is assigned with M to update STATUS field of AM.BENCH.PERF to indicate manual correction.
